name: Crystal Ball of True Seeing
description: This magic item is not detailed in the 2024 Player's Handbook Chapter 6: Equipment. The text states: 'Hundreds of magic items are detailed in the Dungeon Master's Guide, since the DM decides when you find such an item.' Crystal Ball of True Seeing is a Legendary wondrous item (requires attunement) found in the Dungeon Master's Guide. It is a variant of the Crystal Ball that additionally grants the Truesight sense while using the ball to scry.
